name: Cultuzz
overview:
Cultuzz provides a suite of integrated software solutions to the hospitality industry that helps hoteliers to sell their inventory on the Internet.

The success of Cultuzz is based on in-house software solutions, such as CultSwitch, CultBay and CultBooking. Cultuzz stores all the relevant information of the respective hotel in a central database, along with availabilities, prices, cancellation policy and payment methods all the way through to images and descriptions of rooms and street maps. In fully automated processes, the data in question is exchanged between the hotel management program (PMS) and numerous booking platforms. Incoming reservations are immediately returned to the hotel systems, ensuring that the data circulation system is completely closed.

CultBay is a full service of Cultuzz for hoteliers that allow them to sell room nights using the online auction platform eBay. With more than 2,000 hotel partners auctioning more than 10,000 successful auctions per month Cultuzz is the worldwide leader in selling hotel rooms on eBay. Clients include international hotel chains and private managed hotels.
